pr_title: feat(prov-serv): Add APIs for getAttestationMechanism for individual …

timeline.message:
feat(prov-serv): Add APIs for getAttestationMechanism for individual and group enrollments

These new APIs allow you to retrieve the symmetric keys for enrollments using symmetric key attestation

timeline.bodyText: Intentionally empty class. The important part of this file is that the class extends ProvisioningServiceClientTests and is assigned to a test group
timeline.author: timtay-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: Since these are new APIs, is there an action todo for any public documentation?

+    /**
+     * Get the attestation mechanism details for a given individual enrollment
+     * @param registrationId the registration id of the individual enrollment to look up the attestation mechanism for

+     * @throws ProvisioningServiceClientException if any exception is thrown while getting the attestation mechanism
